title: Tablet PC Utilization Strategies in Digital Learning Environments: Self-Regulated and Collaborative Learning Applications

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and experience using educational apps
context.additional_context: Designing tablet-based learning activities and strengthening evaluation capabilities while considering disparities between urban and rural educational environments.

learning_goals: Learners can achieve over 80% of their personal learning goals by applying self-regulated learning strategies in digital environments.
Learners enhance collaborative learning competencies by over 70% while performing group assignments using tablet collaboration tools.
Learners evaluate the effectiveness of tablet-based classes at 4 points or higher (on a 5-point scale) through a digital learning satisfaction survey.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
